trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGWILMATERIALIZE_00084_MUTAMIX_000_01<tab>Pshhh...? Uplander wants to remove materia? Uplander need but wedgy-pry it off. If uplander is lucky, materia not become bittybits!
TEXT_REGWILMATERIALIZE_00084_MUTAMIX_000_02<tab>If you wish to remove materia from an item, highlight its icon and select Retrieve Materia. There is a chance that the materia will be salvaged.
